column1: #Text=RuleAlign is a dataset designed to evaluate rule-based alignment of language models.
#Text=- 200 training queries per scenario (low-data learning scenario)
#Text=- Weak annotations provided for each query
#Text=To run the evaluation on the RuleAlign dataset, use the following command:
#Text=Replace `xxx` with the name of the model you want to evaluate.
#Text=If you find this dataset useful for your research, please kindly cite our paper:
#Text=For any questions or issues regarding the RuleEval dataset, please contact the corresponding author.
